Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Fillmore
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Roosevelt and Kedzie due to street blockage near Kedzie/Fillmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Roosevelt and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Fillmore.

Allow extra travel time.
